casebody.data:
ADVANCED MICROTHERM, INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
NORMAN WRIGHT MECHANICAL EQUIPMENT CORPORATION, et al. No. 13-466. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 13, 2014. Case below, 525 Fed.Appx. 612 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
